banner.text: Let's show a button to restart when the player loses
First let's make the button restart the game, open the Events tray
Drag the block onto your code space
Drop the block anywhere on your code space
Change app starts to Button is clicked so the code within activates when you click the button
We can reset the game with a control block, open the Control tray
This block is the same as clicking the reset button, drag it onto your code space
Connect it to this block so it runs when the button is clicked
Try clicking the RESTART button and see what happens
Now let's make the button only show when it's game over, open the Button tray
Drag the block onto your code space
Now to make it hide from the start, open the Button tray
Drag the block onto your code space
Try playing the game again, now we get a score and a way to start playing again
Why not try remixing by changing the Ball or making the Paddle a different size
